operationName.name: listaRegistrosItems
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr) *(1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW)))) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC(CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, ibd003.T$CONV, T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte * (1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte * (1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, REPLACE(TRUNC((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 8), ',', '.') AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = ibd003.t$item AND ibd003.t$unit = 'UN' INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItems
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr)) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, 1 AS Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch * col020.t$nuti END ELSE col020.t$camo END) / 1000, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, 1 AS T$CONV, 1 AS T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS RunspeedExpected, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, 1 AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: listaRegistrosItemsUSA
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, sfc001.t$qrdr AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END Filter4, REPLACE(TRUNC( CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END / CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 0) ELSE 1 END, 8), ',', '.') AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, ibd003.T$CONV, T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, rou102.t$exin AS RunspeedExpected, rou102.t$exin AS JobMaxRunRate, REPLACE(TRUNC((1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))), 8), ',', '.') AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = ibd003.t$item AND ibd003.t$unit = 'UN' INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid INNER JOIN {0}.ttirou102{1} rou102 ON rou102.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND rou102.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.stringSQL: SELECT col003.t$mcno, sfc001.t$pdno Name, sfc010.t$item, sfc001.t$osta, REPLACE(CONCAT(CONCAT(TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm), ' - '), ibd001.t$dsca), '&', 'y') AS Filter1, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN ROUND((sfc001.t$qrdr)) ELSE sfc001.t$qrdr END AS ProductionQtyExpected, CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 'UN' ELSE ibd001.t$cuni END AS Filter3, 1 AS Filter4, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN CASE TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) WHEN 'CJ' THEN 1 ELSE DECODE(TRIM(ibd001.t$dscb), 'PP', 0.92, 'PS', 1.04, 0) * col020.t$cali * col020.t$anch END ELSE col020.t$camo END AS CycleFactor, CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END t$camo, TRIM(ibd001.t$cuni) As Unidad, TRUNC((sfc010.t$prte / 3600), 8) prte, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY col003.t$mcno) AS AUTOINT, com100.t$nama, col020.t$coba, sfc001.t$qrdr, 1 AS T$CONV, 1 AS T$RPOW, sfc010.t$prte, col003.t$ccos, REPLACE(TRUNC((CASE col020.t$camo WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE col020.t$camo END) / ((sfc010.t$prte / 3600)), 8), ',', '.') AS JobMaxRunRate, 1 AS UnidadesCaja, 1 AS InvCycleFactor FROM {0}.tticol003{1} col003 INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON col003.t$mcno = sfc010.t$mcno INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 ON sfc001.t$mitm = sfc010.t$item AND sfc001.t$pdno = sfc010.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccol020{1} col020 ON col020.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttccom100{1} com100 ON col020.t$ofbp = com100.t$bpid WHERE col003.t$moee = 2 AND sfc001.t$osta <= 7 AND col003.t$mcno IN ([p1])

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberSugUbicacionConOrigen
operationName.stringSQL:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT inh210.T$ORNO AS PDNO, TRIM(inh210.T$ITEM) AS MITM, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, nvl((SELECT SUM(T$RSTK) FROM {0}.twhinh210{1} WHERE T$OORG= '[:T$OORG]' AND T$LOCA='INS'),0) STPND, col124.T$QTDT AS QTDL, col124.T$DAFS AS DAFS, col120.T$WHTA AS WHTA, col120.T$SHPO AS SHPO FROM {2} col124 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col124.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.twhinh210{1} inh210 on inh210.t$oorg = '[:T$OORG]' and inh210.t$orno = col120.t$shpo and inh210.t$cwar = col120.t$whta INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = inh210.T$ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 on tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM and tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI and tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE col124.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]' AND col124.T$LOCS = 2
UNION
SELECT inh210.T$ORNO AS PDNO, TRIM(inh210.T$ITEM) AS MITM, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, nvl((SELECT SUM(T$RSTK) FROM {0}.twhinh210{1} WHERE T$OORG= '[:T$OORG]' AND T$LOCA='INS'),0) STPND, col125.T$QTDT AS QTDL, col125.T$DAFS AS DAFS, col120.T$WHTA AS WHTA, col120.T$SHPO AS SHPO FROM {0}.twhcol125{1} col125 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col125.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.twhinh210{1} inh210 on inh210.t$oorg = '[:T$OORG]' and inh210.t$orno = col120.t$shpo and inh210.t$cwar = col120.t$whta INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = inh210.T$ITEM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 on tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM and tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI and tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE col125.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]' AND col125.T$LOCS = 2) ORDER BY DAFS DESC

operationName.name: updateLocation

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoNoClot
operationName.stringSQL:
SELECT col124.T$PAID AS PDNO, col124.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col124.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col124.T$QTDT Qty, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col124.T$ITEM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col124.T$PAID,0,9)) Qtypend FROM {2} col124 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col124.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col124.t$item WHERE col124.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]'
UNION
SELECT col125.T$PAID AS PDNO, col125.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col125.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col125.T$QTDT Qty, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col124.T$ITEM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col125.T$PAID,0,9)) Qtypend FROM {0}.twhcol125{1} col125 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col125.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col125.t$item WHERE col125.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoYesClot
operationName.stringSQL:
SELECT col124.T$PAID AS PDNO, col124.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col124.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col124.T$QTDT QTY, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col124.T$ITEM AND twhinr140.T$CLOT=col124.T$CLOT) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col124.T$PAID,0,9)) QTYPEND FROM {2} col124 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col124.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col124.t$item WHERE col124.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]'
UNION
SELECT col125.T$PAID AS PDNO, col125.T$ITEM AS MITM, col120.T$WHTA AS CWAR, col125.T$CLOT AS CLOT, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, col125.T$QTDT QTY, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=col125.T$ITEM AND twhinr140.T$CLOT=col125.T$CLOT) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol032.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol032{1} ticol032 WHERE ticol032.T$ORNO=substr(col125.T$PAID,0,9)) QTYPEND FROM {0}.twhcol125{1} col125 INNER JOIN {0}.twhcol120{1} col120 on col120.T$UNID = col125.T$UNID INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 on tcibd001.T$ITEM = col125.t$item WHERE col125.T$PAID = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByNumberReceipt
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT twhinh210.T$RCNO AS RCNO, twhinh210.T$ORNO AS ORNO, twhinh210.T$ITEM AS ITEM, ttcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, twhinh210.T$RCUN AS RCUN, twhinh210.T$OORG AS OORG, twhinh210.T$OSET AS OSET , twhinh210.T$PONO AS PONO, twhinh210.T$SEQN AS SEQN, ttcibd001.T$KLTC AS KLTC, twhinh210.T$CLOT AS CLOT FROM {2} twhinh210 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ttcibd001 ON ttcibd001.T$ITEM = twhinh210.T$ITEM WHERE twhinh210.T$RCNO = '[:T$RCNO]' AND twhinh210.T$CONF = 2

operationName.name: findByNumberReceiptAndOrigin
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT twhinh210.T$ORNO AS ORNO, twhinh210.T$ITEM AS ITEM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, twhinh210.T$CLOT AS CLOT, twhinh210.T$ASTK AS ASTK, twhinh210.T$CWAR AS CWAR, twhinh210.T$QADV AS QADV, twhinh210.T$LOCA AS LOCA, twhwmd300.T$BINB AS BINB, twhinh210.T$OORG AS OORG,twhinh210.T$OSET AS OSET, twhinh210.T$PONO AS PONO,twhinh210.T$SEQN AS SEQN FROM {2} twhinh210 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = twhinh210.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.twhwmd300{1} twhwmd300 ON twhwmd300.T$LOCA = twhinh210.T$LOCA AND twhinh210.T$CWAR = twhwmd300.T$CWAR WHERE twhinh210.T$RSTK >= twhinh210.T$QADV AND twhwmd300.T$BINB = 2 AND twhinh210.T$RCNO = '[:T$RCNO]' AND twhinh210.T$OORG = '[:T$OORG]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberAndOrigin
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT T$OORG AS OORG, T$ORNO AS ORNO, T$OSET AS OSET, T$PONO AS PONO, T$SEQN AS SEQN FROM {2} WHERE T$ORNO = '[:T$ORNO]' AND T$OORG = '[:T$OORG]' AND TRIM(T$ITEM) = '[:T$ITEM]' AND T$CLOT = '[:T$CLOT]'

operationName.name: findRecordByOrderNumber
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT RTRIM(twhinh225.T$ORNO) AS ORNO, twhinh225.T$ITEM AS ITEM, ttcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, twhinh225.T$ATUN AS ATUN, twhinh225.T$ASTK AS ASTK, twhinh225.T$ASTR AS ASTR, twhinh225.T$OORG AS OORG, twhinh225.T$OSET AS OSET, twhinh225.T$PONO AS PONO, twhinh225.T$SERN AS SERN, twhinh225.T$SEQN AS SEQN, twhinh225.T$CLOT AS CLOT, twhinh225.T$CWAR AS CWAR, twhinh225.T$LOCA AS LOCA, twhwmd200.T$SLOC AS SLOC FROM {2} twhinh225 INNER JOIN {0}.twhwmd200{1} twhwmd200 ON twhwmd200.T$CWAR = twhinh225.T$CWAR INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ttcibd001 ON ttcibd001.T$ITEM = twhinh225.T$ITEM WHERE twhinh225.T$ORNO = '[:T$ORNO]' AND twhinh225.T$RLSD = 2 AND twhinh225.T$OSET = '[:T$OSET]' AND twhinh225.T$PONO = '[:T$PONO]' AND twhinh225.T$SERN = '[:T$SERN]' AND twhinh225.T$SEQN = '[:T$SEQN]'

operationName.name: findByDocumentNumber
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT twhinh430.T$SHPM AS SHPM, tqmcol030.T$TYBP AS TYBP FROM {2} twhinh430 INNER JOIN {0}.tqmcol030{1} tqmcol030 ON tqmcol030.T$BPID = twhinh430.T$STCO WHERE twhinh430.T$SHPM = '[:T$SHPM]' GROUP BY T$SHPM,T$TYBP

operationName.name: getInformationDocumentNational

operationName.name: getLotInfo
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT twhinh431.T$ITEM AS ITEM, ttcibd001.T$DSCA AS DSCA, twhinh431.T$CLOT AS CLOT, tqmptc100.T$IORN AS IORN , twhinh431.T$SHPM AS SHPM FROM {2} twhinh431 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ttcibd001 ON ttcibd001.T$ITEM = twhinh431.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.tqmptc100{1} tqmptc100 ON tqmptc100.T$ORNO = twhinh431.T$CLOT AND tqmptc100.T$ORGN = 4 WHERE twhinh431.T$SHPM = '[:T$SHPM]'

operationName.name: getLotSize
operationName.stringSQL:
SELECT
CAST(SUM((T$QSHP))*(1/ttcibd003.T$CONV)*power(10,(ttcibd003.T$RPOW*-1)) AS DECIMAL) AS TAMLOTE
FROM {2} twhinh431 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ttcibd001 ON ttcibd001.T$ITEM = twhinh431.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.tqmptc100{1} tqmptc100 ON tqmptc100.T$ORNO = twhinh431.T$CLOT AND tqmptc100.T$ORGN = 4 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ttcibd003 ON ttcibd003.T$ITEM = twhinh431.T$ITEM AND ttcibd003.T$BASU = ttcibd001.T$CUNI AND ttcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PZ' WHERE twhinh431.T$SHPM = '[:T$SHPM]' AND ROWNUM = 1 GROUP BY twhinh431.T$SHPM, twhinh431.T$ITEM,ttcibd003.T$CONV,ttcibd003.T$RPOW

operationName.name: actualizarRegistro_Param

operationName.name: invLabel_generaSecuenciaOrden
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(t$sqnb),INSTR(MAX(t$sqnb), '-', 1) + 1, LENGTH(MAX(t$sqnb)) - INSTR(MAX(t$sqnb), '-', 1)), '0') + 1, 3, '0') SECUENCIA, INSTR(MAX(t$sqnb), '-', 1) POSICION, MAX(t$sqnb) secuence FROM {2} WHERE t$pdno = '[p1]'

operationName.name: GenericProducts_listaRegistroOrden_Param
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT sfc001.ROWID ID, RTRIM(sfc001.t$pdno) orden, TRIM(sfc001.t$mitm) item, TRIM(ibd001.t$dsca) desci, TRIM(T$CUNI) unidad, T$UNIT, ibd003.T$CONV, CASE TRIM(T$UNIT) WHEN 'UN' THEN ROUND(1/(ibd003.T$CONV * POWER(10, T$RPOW))) ELSE T$CONV END FACTOR FROM {0}.ttisfc001{1} sfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} ibd001 ON ibd001.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} sfc010 ON sfc010.t$pdno = sfc001.t$pdno INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ibd003 ON ibd003.t$item = sfc001.t$mitm WHERE sfc001.t$pdno='[p1]' AND sfc001.t$osta < 8 AND TRIM(T$UNIT) = 'UN' ORDER BY sfc001.t$pdno

operationName.name: findByOrderNumber
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS ITEM, tcibd001.T$DSCA AS DESCRIPCIONITEM, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS BODEGA, tcmcs003.T$DSCA AS DESCRIPCIONBODEGA, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS TOTAL, tisfc001.T$QDLV AS ENTREGADO, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - tisfc001.T$QTDL AS PENDIENTE, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS UNIDAD, tisfc001.T$OSTA AS ESTATUS, tisfc001.T$QTDL AS CANTCONF FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmcs003 ON tcmcs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR WHERE tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberSugUbicacion
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT DISTINCT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, TRIM(tisfc001.T$MITM) AS MITM, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, nvl((SELECT SUM(T$STKT) FROM BAAN.twhinh211448 WHERE T$OORG=4 AND T$LOCA='INS' AND T$ORNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO GROUP BY tisfc001.T$PDNO),0) STPND, ticol022.T$QTDL AS QTDL FROM {2} tisfc001 JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND ticol022.T$PRO2 = 2 AND ticol022.T$PRO1 = 1 LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 ON tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberConfirmRecep
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ticol022.T$SQNB AS SQNB, tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, rtrim(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$OSTA AS OSTA, tisfc001.T$CWAR CWAR, tcmcs003.T$DSCA DSCACWAR, ticol022.T$QTDL AS QTDL, T$QRDR AS QRDR, tisfc001.T$QTDL - (select nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol025{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM=tisfc001.T$MITM) AS QTYPEND, T$QDLV + (select nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol025{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) AS TOTQTYENT, tcibd003.T$CONV AS QTYPLT, ticol022.T$DELE AS DELE FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tisfc001.T$MITM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmcs003 ON tcmcs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 ON tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE ticol022.T$PRO1 = 2 AND ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]'

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoNoClot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - (SELECT nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} WHERE T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM=tisfc001.T$MITM) Qty, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=tisfc001.T$MITM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol030.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} ticol030 WHERE ticol030.T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO) Qtypend FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tisfc001.T$MITM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]' AND ticol022.T$PRO2 = '2'

operationName.name: findBySqnbPdnoYesClot
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, RTRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - (SELECT nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} WHERE T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM=tisfc001.T$MITM) QTY, (SELECT nvl(sum(twhinr140.T$STKS),0) FROM {0}.twhinr140{1} twhinr140 WHERE TRIM(twhinr140.T$LOCA)='[:T$LOCA]' AND twhinr140.T$CWAR='[:T$CWAR]' AND twhinr140.T$CLOT=tisfc001.T$PDNO AND twhinr140.T$ITEM=tisfc001.T$MITM) - (SELECT nvl(sum(ticol030.T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol030{1} ticol030 WHERE ticol030.T$PDNO=tisfc001.T$PDNO) QTYPEND FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tisfc001.T$MITM = tcibd001.T$ITEM INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]' AND ticol022.T$PRO2 = '2'

operationName.name: findByPdnoSqnbAndPro1
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT ticol022.T$SQNB AS SQNB,tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QTYORD, tisfc001.T$QTDL + (SELECT nvl(sum(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol025{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) QTYPNDCONF FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.tticol022{1} ticol022 ON ticol022.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO WHERE ticol022.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]' AND ticol022.T$SQNB = '[:T$SQNB]' AND ticol022.T$PRO1 = '[:T$PRO1]'

operationName.name: findByPdnoArticulo
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001170.T$MITM AS MITM, tcibd001170.T$DSCA AS DSCA FROM {2} tisfc001170 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001170 ON tcibd001170.T$ITEM = tisfc001170.T$MITM WHERE TRIM(T$PDNO) = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberAnuncioOrd
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT tisfc001.T$PDNO AS PDNO, tisfc001.T$MITM AS MITM, TRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCAITEM, tcibd001.T$CUNI AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$OSTA AS OSTA, tisfc001.T$CWAR AS CWAR, tcmcs003.T$DSCA AS DSCACWAR, tisfc001.T$QRDR - tisfc001.T$QDLV - tisfc001.T$QTDL - (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol020{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) AS QTYPEND, tcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QRDR, tisfc001.T$QDLV + (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol020{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.t$pdno AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) TOTQTYEND, tisfc001.T$QDLV + T$QTDL + (SELECT nvl(SUM(T$QTDL),0) FROM {0}.tticol020{1} WHERE T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO AND T$MITM = tisfc001.T$MITM) AS QTYREC FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} tcibd003 ON tcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND tcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND tcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' INNER JOIN {0}.ttcmcs003{1} tcmcs003 ON tcmcs003.T$CWAR = tisfc001.T$CWAR WHERE tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'

operationName.name: findByOrderNumberPalletTags
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT TRIM(tisfc001.T$PDNO) AS PDNO, TRIM(tisfc001.T$MITM) AS MITM, TRIM(tcibd001.T$DSCA) AS DSCA, ttcibd003.T$CONV AS CONV, tisfc001.T$QRDR AS QRDR, TRIM(tisfc010.T$MCNO) AS MCNO, TRIM(tcibd001.T$CUNI) AS CUNI, tisfc001.T$QDLV AS QDLV FROM {2} tisfc001 INNER JOIN {0}.ttcibd001{1} tcibd001 ON tcibd001.T$ITEM = tisfc001.T$MITM INNER JOIN {0}.ttisfc010{1} tisfc010 ON tisfc010.T$PDNO = tisfc001.T$PDNO LEFT JOIN {0}.ttcibd003{1} ttcibd003 ON ttcibd003.T$BASU = tcibd001.T$CUNI AND ttcibd003.T$ITEM = tcibd001.T$ITEM AND ttcibd003.T$UNIT = 'PLT' WHERE tisfc001.T$OSTA IN ('5','7','9') AND tisfc001.T$PDNO = '[:T$PDNO]'
